io.netty.handler.ssl.ocsp.IoTransport

  • Packages that use IoTransport 
    Package Description
    io.netty.handler.ssl.ocsp
    Certificate validation using OCSP

    • Uses of IoTransport in io.netty.handler.ssl.ocsp

      Fields in io.netty.handler.ssl.ocsp declared as IoTransport 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IoTransport IoTransport.DEFAULT
      Default IoTransport which uses NioEventLoop, NioSocketChannel and NioDatagramChannel.
